title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 5.1 - Filing of summary statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 5.1 - Filing of summary statement

State Regulations

The Dormitory Authority appointed under the provisions of
chapter 524 of the Laws of 1944 shall file with the Regents a summary statement
concerning each project for the erection of dormitories. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
5.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
